execution_plan.description: Count active products per category (include categories with zero active products).
execution_plan.query: SELECT categories.id AS s1__id, categories.name AS s1__name, COUNT(products.id) AS s1__active_product_count FROM categories LEFT JOIN products ON products.category_id = categories.id AND products.is_active = true GROUP BY categories.id, categories.name;

execution_plan.description: Count active items per group (include groups with zero active items). Active items are those with items.active = 'Y'.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_groups.gid AS s2__gid, product_groups.group_name AS s2__group_name, COUNT(items.code) AS s2__active_item_count FROM product_groups LEFT JOIN items ON items.group_ref = product_groups.gid AND items.active = 'Y' GROUP BY product_groups.gid, product_groups.group_name;
